Super entretenido cuando juegas con amigos y si juegas solo también. Ya sea como Killer o superviviente, es un juego que tras echarle horas te acaba gustando el juego.

Juego entretenido. Ninguna partida va a ser igual. No es para nada monótono, si que es verdad que hay muchos bugs, pero son soportables(algunos) y divertidos otros(algunos no tanto, pero se acaba pasando por alto todo esto).

this game is very fun to play with friends or alone kinda scary and stressful but that's what makes the beauty of it. I really like the fact that you can play as the killer and the survivor. Love It.


prout.

Unpopular Opinion: BHVR tries their best. Often their best isn't so great, but at least they seem to give somewhat of a damn about the product they've put out which is more than I can say for many companies these days. The game can be unfair, unforgiving, and uninspired at times. That being said there really isn't anything out there like it that does what it does as well as it does it it. If you're a fan of horror, you owe it to yourself to at least try it out. DBD answers the question: what feels like a cult but isn't a cult?
неплохая игра можно играть за выживших и маньяков самый мой любимый манькяк это лигеон прошу зделать побольше скинов на лигеона кроме людей под маской
i like this game bcus i like horor
ahhh sacary bruhhdda baba boy bruh moment haves milk (thumbs up)

Ich liebe dieses Spiel wirklich. Aber wo ist der Haken (kleines Wortspiel)? Ganz einfach: Es gibt vermehrt Abends nur noch Camper. Und obwohl es verschiedenste Möglichkeiten gibt Spieler zu melden, die sich falsch verhalten, tun die Macher von DBD nichts dagegen! Das ist sehr schade und kann einem auf Dauer das Spiel vermiesen. Man muss natürlich sagen, dass es die Camper in jedem Spiel gibt, aber man könnte ja wenigstens auch versuchen etwas dagegen zu tun. Trotzdem ein großartiges Game, dass ich auch weiterhin mit viel Freude zocken werde. Ein muss für Horror-Fans, insbesondere die Horrorfilm Liebhaber.

Dead By Daylight more like Bread By Baylight

Pros:
-Best multiplayer horror game
-Crossplay

Cons:
-Fun is short lived as the strategies grow stagnant 
-Zero compensation for toxic behavior
Toxisity includes...
 Survivors:
 -I'm going to befriend the killer/ throw myself to the killer immediately 
 -I'm going to ensure the game drags on by hiding while the exit is open (everyone else has long since escaped)
 -I'm going to flag the killer and point out my friends because I befriended him.
-I'm not going to do the objective, rather, I will sit next to a palette and patiently wait. Then I repeat the process when my palette gets knocked down(I know the maps VERY well).

 Killers:
 -I'm going to knock one player and camp their corpse for days

It a good game, I love playing it, but some of the people that play killer just make the game down right bad. Not the developers faults, but maybe they can make something to stop camping. I was think about maybe slowing down the killer if they're to close for a certain period of time. Of course they need to make the radius around the hook slightly big, so they won't camp.
